channel.title: Git on John Kane
channel.description: Recent content in Git on John Kane

item.title: Saved by Dangling Blobs
item.description: import numpy as np np.random.randn(10) What I want to provide perhaps a google search result for someone who discovers they did the same thing I did and hope that they may be able to recover them. For most of 2017 I have worked on a project and stored the files locally, not doing version control with git. As the project matured I realized I would soon need to share the code and to make use of all git has to offer, I should connect it to a repository.
